intro: Drosanthemum striatum var. pallens, commonly known as the pale-striated drosanthemum, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Aizoaceae family, characterized by its succulent leaves and showy flowers. The plant features fleshy, cylindrical leaves that are typically pale green with distinct longitudinal stripes. Its flowers are small, star-shaped, and often display a range of colors from white to pink. It thrives in well-drained soil and full sun, making it a popular choice for rock gardens and xeriscaping.
